_metadata.description: Ethnic minority MPs and Lords in the 2024 UK Parliament — ministerial subset validated, full list requires manual completion
_metadata.methodology: Following British Future's methodology: 'ethnic minority' defined as anyone identifying as other than White per 2021 Census categories. Absence from this dataset implies White.
sources: House of Commons Library Research Briefing SN01156 (October 2025)
Individual MP biographical records and public statements
notes: Ethnicity is self-defined. Broad categories follow ONS Census 2021 groupings.
The 'is_minister' field reflects current (Feb 2026) ministerial status.
parlId values are validated against the existing MP_INFO dataset.
The name_in_data field matches the key used in MP_INFO for programmatic joining.
Some categorisations (especially 'Mixed') are approximate — several of these ministers have one parent from an ethnic minority background and one White British parent.

ministers.name: David Lammy
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Black Caribbean — born in London, parents from Guyana

ministers.name: Shabana Mahmood
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Pakistani — born in Birmingham to Pakistani parents

ministers.name: Lisa Nandy
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — father is Indian (Kolkata-born), mother is White British

ministers.name: Zubir Ahmed
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Pakistani — born in Glasgow to Pakistani parents, NHS surgeon

ministers.name: Kanishka Narayan
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Sri Lankan — born in Sri Lanka, moved to UK as a child

ministers.name: Miatta Fahnbulleh
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Black African — born in Germany to Liberian parents, grew up in UK

ministers.name: Louise Sandher-Jones
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — Indian (Sikh) and White British heritage

ministers.name: Darren Jones
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — Caribbean and White British heritage, grew up in Bristol

ministers.name: James Murray
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — Jamaican and White British heritage

ministers.name: Baroness Chapman of Darlington
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — of partial South Asian heritage

ministers.name: Baroness Lloyd of Effra
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Black Caribbean — born in London, Jamaican heritage

ministers.name: Alistair Carns
ministers.name_in_data: Alistair Carns DSO OBE MC MP
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — of partial South Asian heritage

ministers.name: Georgia Gould
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — mother is of Indian heritage (Gill Gould née Shamin Gill)

ministers.name: Steve Reed
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — Ghanaian and White British heritage

ministers.name: Hamish Falconer
ministers.ethnicity_detail: Mixed — mother is of Indian/South Asian heritage (son of Lord Falconer and Camilla Wilton-Pakenham)

_verification_notes: VALIDATED: David Lammy, Shabana Mahmood, Seema Malhotra, Lisa Nandy, Satvir Kaur, Dr Zubir Ahmed, Kanishka Narayan, Miatta Fahnbulleh — clearly identified as ethnic minority in public records.
VALIDATED: Baroness Lloyd of Effra — Jamaican heritage, well documented.

NEEDS REVIEW: Pat McFadden — adopted, has discussed mixed heritage publicly but categorisation is uncertain. Currently listed as White in most sources. EXCLUDED from ministers list pending verification.
NEEDS REVIEW: Wes Streeting — has mentioned mixed heritage in some interviews but is generally categorised as White. EXCLUDED pending verification.

NEEDS REVIEW: Baroness Chapman, Georgia Gould, Hamish Falconer, Alistair Carns, Steve Reed, James Murray, Darren Jones, Louise Sandher-Jones — all have partial ethnic minority heritage. Some may not self-identify as ethnic minority. These are included based on best available public information but should be verified.
The exact count of 17 ethnic minority ministers is approximate. British Future counts 90 ethnic minority MPs in total across parliament; the ministerial subset requires individual verification.

TO COMPLETE: The full list of all 90 ethnic minority MPs needs manual research. Approximately 50 further Labour MPs, 15 Conservatives, 5 Lib Dems, and 4 independents need to be added with verified parlIds.
